column4: Am trying to set up a link between two puters on home net - both with ibex - have opend sharing on the public folder on both pcs but they dont see each other - any tips??
partly cos i am a relative newbie and partly i have a damaged memory (war disabled..) cant remember where to find the ips on the pcs???
can you log in to the router web interface?
ssh is too complicated - and i know nothing about it etc.. I just need to access shared folders on both machings via network smb:/// etc.. how to do this please...?
you need to know the ips of the other pcs
sorry forgot to put your name...
what to do next.. jus tto use the gui to see the folders...
ok thanks - but I thought the intrepid would jus tbe able to s e e the otehr pc...?
yea its 8.00 here and i have slept at 1.30
creative soundcards are a bad idea for linux
what would you suggest in a similar price range???
i think you should have a look at alsa site to see what cards are supported.
